categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Thug boss, along with other Coruscant mercenaries, was hired in 32 BBY to prevent two Jedi from reaching their Jedi Temple. They were unable to defeat the Jedi, and the Thug boss was killed in combat against the Jedi.
The Thug boss appears in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles.
